message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.COMM, cs.SY, cs.DC 

The paper discusses the use of multiple satellites to improve the spectral efficiency of broadcast transmissions, which falls under the category of information theory and communication systems. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.COMM (Communication and Networking) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the theoretical framework based on network information theory, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of multiuser detection strategy at the receiver, which could fall under cs.SY (Systems and Control) or cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
